attributes.action: give full disclosure of all evidence related to the hillsborough disaster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To disclose this information 10 years before the 30 year deadline in order to investigate and take responsibility for mistakes made.  Justice to the families and people that lost there lifes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
